talk1035:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>We don't have to worry about the sludge
raining down anymore, so now I can just
relax while I watch the young ones.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughL>This...<sp:5:0:0>is the life!
talk1036:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>This is what Zora's Domain should always
be like!<sp:5:0:0> Just look at how ecstatic the
young ones are.
talk1037:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Hee-hee. <sp:5:0:0>The young ones go right to
sleep because they've been playing
so much!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It's all thanks to the sludge going away.<sp:5:1:0>
I'm grateful to everyone who helped...<sp:5:0:0>
And that especially includes you!
talk1039:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>The children can sleep safe and sound all
thanks to everyone's efforts here in the
domain, most especially yours!
Thank you so much! For everything!
talk1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy_00>This fishing spot is incredible! It's so
clear, you can see the fishies in
the water!
That's probably thanks to Prince Sidon
cleaning the water in Mipha Court,
which is up above!
talk1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_00>I can't go wandering anymore, so all I can
catch is Hyrule bass. <sp:5:0:0>However...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I spotted the tastiest one ever to swim
the seas...<sp:5:1:0>and I caught it!

It's for my darling! Hee-hee!
talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_00>I found a hearty bass in this floating place
and got a little overexcited...

<sp:3:0:2:0600>But I've calmed down. Pretty much.
I've been taking a nice, little break
from my work, you know!
<snd:LaughS_00>Because my sweet darling said he hoped
I would stick close to home for a while,
so what can a lady in love do, hee-hee!♪
talk1043:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Think_00>I want to see <clr:0000>the young ones <clr:ffff>pretending
to be <clr:0000>King Dorephan<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> I really, really do!
talk1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Chat_00>That's right. They're playing as though
they're our beloved king.

All I heard was something about
"the sludge" and "you monsters!"

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think_01>It seemed like a strange game,
to be honest.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>I'm just grateful they can play like that in
the <clr:0000>throne room<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> That means I don't
have to worry about them!
talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Chat_00>I'm so glad I didn't accidentally stay on
that island in the sky forever.

My young ones are here and my sweet
darling as well!<sp:5:1:0> There's always joy and
laughter to be found at home.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>♪But I suppose I do miss...<sp:5:0:0>catching as
many hearty bass as I please, hee-hee.♪
talk1044:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL>My love helped me catch this Hyrule bass!
It was all for my darling!
talk1045:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>I need to try harder to catch some tasty
fish for my family!

It's important to eat well and keep your
energy up when times are tough.
talk1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:QuestionNormal_00>So...<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>The young ones<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> are pretending to be
King Dorephan for fun.<sp:5:1:0> But you know,
whenever I bring them some fish...
Boom!<sp:5:1:0> They stop what they were doing,
just like that.<sp:5:0:0> I would reeeally like to know
what they're up to.
talk1046:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>Right! I'll do my best to catch some
yummy fish! <sp:5:0:0>I'll make you proud,
my darling!
talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Humming_01>I need to put the young ones to sleep!


I also need to make sure I don't fall
asleep myself first...
talk1047:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL>My young ones are here and my darling
as well! So much love and laughter.
There's no better place in all of Hyrule!
talk1048:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Hee-hee... <sp:5:0:0>Maybe I'll make some time to
spend with my darling. Just the two of us
relaxing for the first time in a while...
talk1030: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Wakeup_01>I think I need to get some rest soon...
talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Wow!<sp:5:0:0> Are you <sp:5:0:0>a fellow fishing enthusiast?


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Ha, no. I'm getting carried away. <sp:5:0:0>In any
case, if you're looking to catch some fish,
this is the best spot!
That's all thanks to Prince Sidon.
He's cleaning the water in Mipha
Court, which is up above!
talk1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_00>The young ones are so happy that they
can run around as much as they please!

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Though they were a little disappointed
they can't pretend to be King Dorephan
in the throne room anymore.
